name: One Night At Baldi's Literature Club!
name_original: One Night At Baldi's Literature Club!
description:
///COMMUNITY UPDATE JUST RELEASED!!!///

What if Baldi's Basics, Doki Doki Literature Club, and Five Nights At Freddy's were all combined into ONE HORROR GAME?!

Well, see for yourself!

Update Log:

  • Added a ‘A United We Code Production’ splash screen
  • Added Main Menu ‘Fade In’ effect
  • Added Main Menu ‘Fade Out’ effect
  • Added intro where you walk in to the office
  • Added a ‘fade out’ effect if your power runs out
  • Fixed glitch where if you eat with principal in range he didn’t get triggered (now he does).
  • Fixed GottaSweep SERIOUS Button Glitch
  • Fixed GottaSweep SERIOUS Sound Glitch
  • Ensured that cameras cannot get bullied in the case where SweepinTime has begun or a bit earlier.
  • Added Sonic Coins Which increase your power by 2%
  • Added New vision effects
  • Added (lots of) new MainMenu music
  • Added MainMenu music switcher
  • Added screenshake if you get jumpscared by Baldi, FirstPrize, Monika, or by Cuphead
  • Added ‘Mute Baldi’ button to mute Baldi’s call
  • Added a warning triangle that flashed in your radar if Baldi appears, along with the radar warning
  • Fixed Zesty Bar instruction Glitch where even if you clicked on the Zesty Bar, it would not go away and get stuck for the rest of the game’s duration.
  • Added NEW MENU UI! (Thanking special YouTubers which played my game)
  • When the power gets to 0%, the light will fade away, then taking you to the 0% power screen.

NEW UPDATE [NOW ADDED CUPHEAD]!!!
